title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 300.4 - Accessibility Wording
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 300.4 - Accessibility Wording

State Regulations

The word handicapped shall be removed from any signs or other
means of communication where such word appears; the word accessible may be used
in its place. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
300.4

Adopted, New

York State Register November 19, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 46, eff. 11/19/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
